params.attack: Basic (overkill towards Jailor type roles im not fuckin listing them here.)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Can Perform the Factional Mafia Kill OR visit another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit somebody who is not in jail, they will be given something to get out of jail once.
- If you visit someone in jail, you will break them out and direct their ability before the night is over. They will be informed of this
- If you are jailed, you will escape and kill the person who jailed you
- If you visit a Jailor type role, you will kill them.
- If the last Jailor type role dies by any means, you will become a Random Mafia. If any Jailor type roles are still alive, you will not change roles
- This role cannot exist without a Jailor type role
- This role cannot exist along side a WM Underboss.
